column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Check and see if your company allows for free admission with their corporate sponsorship agreement! I feel blessed that my organization allows myself and a guest free admission upon request as there are so many exhibits worth seeing and not enough time to take it all in in one trip. What I appreciated most was that even amongst some of the more recognizable pieces (Nighthawks
column3: crowds didn't nearly gather as much like I've seen in other art museums. The museum does a fantastic job in providing an experience for all ages but also maintaining and environment conscious of keeping everyone healthy.
